start.choiceA: Do you ignore the rabbit and walk on?
start.choiceB: Do you follow the rabbit's direction?

A.description: You decide to ignore the rabbit and make your way ...
You had heard the stories about orcs...

B.description: You decide to continue on the trail...
B.choiceB: Ignore the cabin and continue on the trail?

A.description: You enter the cabin and notice that there are a few items inside...
